exceptions.exn: Not an inductive goal with 1 constructor.

In environment l, q : nat Hr : 1 < q -> 4 <= power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2 H0 : l + 1 < q H : forall i : nat, i < l -> i < power q 2 H1 : forall y : nat, CodeNat y -> l = 0 /\\ 1 < q /\\ y = 0 \\/ 0 < l /\\ (exists z v v1 : nat, seqs_of_ones v v1 /\\ Code y /\\ Code z /\\ y + l * power (power (S l) 2) r = z * v ⇣ ((r - 1) * v1) /\\ y + v1 + power (power 1 2) r = z + power (power (S l) 2) r) Unable to unify "l = 0 /\\ 1 < q /\\ ?M2301 = 0 \\/ 0 < l /\\ (exists z v v1 : nat, seqs_of_ones v v1 /\\ Code ?M2301 /\\ Code z /\\ ?M2301 + l * power (power (S l) 2) r = z * v ⇣ ((r - 1) * v1) /\\ ?M2301 + v1 + power (power 1 2) r = z + power (power (S l) 2) r)" with "l = 0 /\\ 1 < q /\\ ∑ l (fun i : nat => i * power (power (S i) 2) (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2)) = 0 \\/ 0 < l /\\ (exists z v v1 p0 p1 p2 r1 : nat, p0 = power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2 /\\ r1 + 1 = p0 /\\ p1 = power (S l) 2 /\\ p2 = power p1 p0 /\\ seqs_of_ones v v1 /\\ Code (∑ l (fun i : nat => i * power (power (S i) 2) (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2))) /\\ Code z /\\ ∑ l (fun i : nat => i * power (power (S i) 2) (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2)) + l * p2 = z * v ⇣ (r1 * v1) /\\ ∑ l (fun i : nat => i * power (power (S i) 2) (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2)) + v1 + p0 * p0 = z + p2)".

In environment l, q : nat Hr : 1 < q -> 4 <= power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2 H0 : l + 1 < q H : forall i : nat, i < l -> i < power q 2 H1 : forall y : nat, 0 < l -> (exists z v v1 : nat, seqs_of_ones v v1 /\\ Code y /\\ Code z /\\ y + l * power (power (S l) 2) (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2) = z * v ⇣ ((power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2 - 1) * v1) /\\ y + v1 + power (power 1 2) (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2) = z + power (power (S l) 2) (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2)) -> CodeNat y H2 : forall y : nat, l = 0 -> 1 < q -> y = 0 -> CodeNat y H3 : forall y : nat, CodeNat y -> l = 0 /\\ 1 < q /\\ y = 0 \\/ 0 < l /\\ (exists z v v1 : nat, seqs_of_ones v v1 /\\ Code y /\\ Code z /\\ y + l * power (power (S l) 2) (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2) = z * v ⇣ ((power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2 - 1) * v1) /\\ y + v1 + power (power 1 2) (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2) = z + power (power (S l) 2) (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2)) H4 : forall y : nat, CodeNat y -> l = 0 /\\ 1 < q /\\ y = 0 \\/ 0 < l /\\ (exists z v v1 : nat, seqs_of_ones v v1 /\\ Code y /\\ Code z /\\ y + l * power (power (S l) 2) r = z * v ⇣ ((r - 1) * v1) /\\ y + v1 + power (power 1 2) r = z + power (power (S l) 2) r) Unable to unify "l = 0 /\\ 1 < q /\\ ?M3267 = 0 \\/ 0 < l /\\ (exists z v v1 : nat, seqs_of_ones v v1 /\\ Code ?M3267 /\\ Code z /\\ ?M3267 + l * power (power (S l) 2) r = z * v ⇣ ((r - 1) * v1) /\\ ?M3267 + v1 + power (power 1 2) r = z + power (power (S l) 2) r)" with "1 <= l".

exceptions.tactic: exists z, v, v1, p0, p1, p2, r1.
exceptions.exn: The reference z was not found in the current environment.
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet * is not finished.
Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: intros. split. - split. + apply IncSeq_dio_priv. auto. + right. split. * apply IncSeq_dio_priv. auto. * exists z, v, v1, p0, p1, p2, r1. repeat split; try auto. - intros [H1 [H2 H3]]. apply IncSeq_dio_priv. split; try auto. destruct H1 as [-> | [H4 H5]]. + left. auto. + right. split; try auto. exists z, v, v1. repeat split; try auto. exists z, v, v1, p0, p1, p2, r1. repeat split; try auto.
